input.sentences: we started on our way to the museum .
we passed by the beach which we would go back to later .
our kids almost could n't wait to get into the building .
it was busy | so we had to wait for a while .
eventually | we got in | and the kids had so much fun looking at everything especially this dog .
output.sentences: The road to the beach was very long.
When we made it to the beach we knew the drive was worth it.
There were many little shops along the way.
One of the shops was very busy.
We saw this neat statue of a dog.
